stepsForRegressionAutomation.content: This is the Regression testing Section

<ContentComponent content='Select your functional area using this dropdown' listItems='["Inventory and Stock Ledger","Revenue Accounting-SUS","Revenue Accounting-COI","Item & Purchase Offer"]' listHeader='The options are:'/>
<ContentComponent content='Select the desired test type using this dropdown' listItems='["Regression","E2E"]' listHeader='The options are:'/>

<ContentComponent content='Select desired Entity that you need' listItems='["Inventory and Stock Ledger","Revenue Accounting-SUS","Revenue Accounting-COI","Item & Purchase Offer"]' listHeader='The options are:'/>
<ContentComponent content='Click this button to see previous runs'/>
<ContentComponent content='Click this button to create a new run'/>
<ContentComponent content='Shows all the run details in a tabular form and also does the summary of the run in a form for pie chart'/>

<ContentComponent content='This table shows all the run details' listItems='["Run Id : shows the Id of each run item","Run Status : shows if the run is Success/Fail","Create Date : shows the date of run creation","Completed Date : shows the date of run completion","POT download : to download all the details of the a run"]' listHeader='The columns of the table are:'/>
<ContentComponent content='Summary section shows a pie chart of number of success and failed run'/>

<ContentComponent content='This table shows all the details of a scenario' listHeader='The columns are:' listItems='["Scenario Seq : shows the sequence of scenario","Scenario Desc: shows the desc of the scenario","status : show if it is success or failed scenario","Data Available Ind : data","Enable Ind : Used to enable Ind","View Validations : to view all the validations of the scenario"]'/>
<ContentComponent content='For asking more queries click on the chatbot button'/>

stepsForRestAPI.content: <ContentComponent content='Select your functional area using this dropdown' listItems='["Inventory and Stock Ledger"]' listHeader='There is only one option in this case which is:'/>
<ContentComponent content='Select your Entity area using this dropdown' listItems='["WAC API"]' listHeader='There is only one option in this case which is:'/>
<ContentComponent content='Click this button to see previous runs'/>
<ContentComponent content='Click this button to create a new run'/>

stepForMaintenance.content: <ContentComponent content='Click to move to Scenario maintenance tab'/>
<ContentComponent content='Click to move to POT Query maintenance tab'/>
<ContentComponent content='Select your functional area using this dropdown' listItems='["Inventory and Stock Ledger","Revenue Accounting","Item & Purchase Offer"]' listHeader='The options are:'/>
<ContentComponent content='Select your entity' listItems='["Inventory and Stock Ledger","Revenue Accounting","Item & Purchase Offer"]' listHeader='The options are:'/>
<ContentComponent content='Click on the button to test the scenario'/>

<ContentComponent content='To check all the scenario test details in a tabular form' listHeader='The columns of the table are:' listItems='["Scenario Id : Shows the ID of the scenario","Scenario Description : shows the description of the scenario ","Enable Id: To enable the ID","Validation list : to show the list of all validations"]'/>
<ContentComponent content='Click on the button to add new scenarios'/>
<ContentComponent content='Click on the button to update an existing scenario'/>

stepsForPOTAutomation.content: <ContentComponent content='Use this dropdown to select the desired application' listHeader='The options are :' listItems='["COI","SUS","RIS"]'/>
<ContentComponent content='Use this dropdown to select the desired environment' listHeader='The options are :' listItems='["Dev","Stage"]'/>
<ContentComponent content='Shows all the POT Automation run details in a tabular form'/>
